title: When the mountains move
creator_credit: United Nations, Unesco and Enrico Fulchignoni
brief_description: In the mountains of Colombia where the peasants live isolated from the outside world, a wide radio network for fundamental education has been established. The film describes the immense difficulties which had to be overcome in getting the scheme started and show Radio Sutatenza in action.
